Name: Sokosignal
About the game: Sokosignal is a puzzle game in which you send a signal with each move you make. Some objects will receive your signal and attempt to copy your move, others will not. Some will resend your signal, others will both resend and attempt to copy. Place the right objects on the marked spots to solve each puzzle. Features unique action at a distance mechanic six parts, each adding new objects with new properties over 80 handcrafted levels unlimited undo no tutorial and minimal text - levels designed to teach you new mechanics by doing
